Articles.Content:
So i started playing career mode and i accepted this mission about placing a satellite in orbit.

Everything was going like expected but when i finish with the circularization this happens.

http://imgur.com/mZUWzOQ

Yeah, the game suddenly ignores me and dont let me finish the mission :/

Any clues of what´s going on?
I can't see your picture, but are you going the right way? Usually, when someone says their place a xxx in this sort of orbit contract won't finish, they are 180 degrees off the correct orbit.
I used some imgur fu to find the pic and I still don't know what the problem is. However, it does show the signs of possibly being the "off by 180" problem.
Fixed the link in the OP.
is there a part required by the contract that isnt on the sat?

15 hours ago, Phil deCube said:

I can't see your picture, but are you going the right way? Usually, when someone says their place a xxx in this sort of orbit contract won't finish, they are 180 degrees off the correct orbit.

Ohhh i get it now!.

Yeah im going in the wrong direction, thanks dude
